mapper.insert: insert into groupboard (boardNum, userId, groupName, subject, content) values ( #{boardNum}, #{userId}, #{groupName}, #{subject}, #{content})
insert into groupboard(fileNum, boardNum, userId, saveFilename, originalFilename, fileSize) values ( gboardFile_seq.NEXTVAL, #{boardNum}, #{userId}, #{saveFilename}, #{originalFilename}, #{fileSize})
mapper.update: update groupboard set hitCount=hitCount+1 where boardNum = #{boardNum}
mapper.select: select boardNum, b.userId, userName, subject, content, hitCount, b.created from groupboard b join member m on b.userId = m.userId where boardNum =#{boardNum}

select tb.* from ( select boardNum, subject from groupboard b join member m on b.userId = m.userId
and (boardNum > #{boardNum})
order by boardNum ASC ) tb where ROWNUM=1

select tb.* from ( select boardNum, subject from groupboard b join member m on b.userId = m.userId
and (boardNum < #{boardNum})
order by boardNum DESC ) tb where ROWNUM=1
mapper.insert: insert into groupboardReply ( replyNum, boardNum, userId, content) values ( #{replyNum} #{boardNum}, #{userId}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT NVL(COUNT(*), 0) FROM groupboardReply WHERE boardNum=#{boardNum}
